item.title: Network Analysis in R
item.description: Glossaries Create a graph From edge list From adjacent matrix From data.frame Create random graph Extract vertex and edge and their attributes vertex edges summarize graph statistics Degree and strength Distance Transitivity Network analysis is to study the complexity of the inter-relationships between actors of all sorts and provides an architechural view of individual actor connections. It has been applied to many fields, like social network and gene network, and useful for any systematic studies on individual relationship.
